name: hlobn

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, ccphlo))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c0 ∈ CBan, c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccbn))
-| wb(wcel(c0, chlo), wa(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ CBan)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD ↔(c0 ∈ CBan ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccbn))
-| wb(wcel(c0, chlo), wa(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ CBan)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD ↔(c0 ∈ CBan ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, chlo), wa(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))

comment: Every complex Hilbert space is a complex Banach space. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
